attributes.action: Abolish university tuition fees for English students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
English students are being unfairly treated and discriminated against when compared to other parts of the United Kingdom who do not have to pay University fees.  

We the undersigned wish to appeal on the grounds of equal opportunity for student fees to be abolished for English students attending university and in the interests of equality to be treated as other United Kingdom citizens in respect of tuition fees.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish university tuition fees for English students."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16475

Prime Minister's Office
